墇字的基本解释

墇
zhàng
古同“障”，隔塞。

墇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhàng］
［《廣韻》之亮切，去漾，章。］
［《廣韻》諸良切，平陽，章。］
壅塞。

墇字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　墇； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页237第24
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】諸良切【正韻】止良切，?音章。壅也，隔也，塞也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?之亮切，音幛。與鄣瘴同。

墇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
墇字的起名意思

壅塞。

zhàng
The ancient same "barrier", separated from the plug.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhàng］
[Bright cut of "Guang Yun", go to Yang, chapter. ]
["Guangyun" Zhu Liangqie, Pingyang, chapter. ]
Congestion.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　墇; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 237-24
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Zhu Liang Qi [Zheng Yun] Only good cutting,? Sound chapter. It's a choke, it's a sack, it's a stop.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? It is bright and cut, and the sound is chopped up. Same as Pleiades.
